subject: Mrs. Janet Louise Yellen
body:
Attn: Jeffry

This is to acknowledge the receipt of your email,

You are required to e-mail us with your information for accuracy and to
enable us to transfer your funds as instructed only if you are ready to
make the payment of $285 for your United Nation Tag Number

1. A copy of your valid ID needed
2. Your full name
3. Your Full Address
4. Occupation needed:
5. Your full direct phone number


Yours in Service

Mrs. Janet Louise Yellen
UN Compensation Department
405 East 42nd Street,
New York, NY 10017

subject: FROM Mrs. Janet Louise Yellen
body:
I am hereby attached to you My Work ID to prove these Funds are Real and
Legally  .

I want you to understand that the $285 you are requested to send is for the
United Nation TAG Number before your funds will be transferred to you. This
will help for the impostors not to encroach and for the Registration of
your funds for immediate release to you by the paying bank  (All Citizens
Bank & Trust).

However, your Compensation funds of $5.3 Million US Dollars will be
Transferred to you by the United State Bank  (All Citizens Bank & Trust).
as the authorized and corresponding paying bank under the funding
assistance of the World Bank and United Nation. Meanwhile, View the
attachments.



Below is the Bank Details to send the $285.


BANK NAME: TD BANK
ADDRESS: 650 PELHAM PARKWAY SOUTH BRONX NEW YORK 10462
ACCOUNT NAME: JEFFER K. CONTEH
ACCOUNT NUMBER: 4410610392
RT: 026013673
SWIFT CODE: NRTHUS33XXX




Anticipating your prompt response


Yours in Service

Mrs. Janet Louise Yellen
UN Compensation Department
405 East 42nd Street,
New York, NY 10017

subject: Re: Mrs. Janet Louise Yellen
body:
Hello Mrs. Janet Louise Yellen,

Thank you for your email and the information provided. I'm quite intrigued by this opportunity, but I must admit, I'm not entirely sure what a United Nation Tag Number is. Could you please explain it to me in more detail? 

Also, could you clarify what the payment is for? Is it a processing fee or something else? 

I'm sorry for all the questions, but I just want to make sure I understand everything correctly before proceeding further.

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best regards.

Best wishes,
Jeffry

subject: Re: FROM Mrs. Janet Louise Yellen
body:
Hello Mrs. Janet Louise Yellen,

Thank you for your email and the information provided. It's quite interesting to learn about these funds and the United Nation TAG Number. I must admit, I'm not very familiar with this process.

Could you please explain a bit more about what the United Nation TAG Number is? And how does it help in preventing impostors from encroaching?

Also, could you provide more details about the role of the World Bank and United Nations in this funding assistance? 

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best regards.

Best wishes,
Jeffry

subject: Re: Mrs. Janet Louise Yellen
body:
Hello Mrs. Janet Louise Yellen,

Thank you for reaching out to me! I'm always excited to help out where I can. However, I'm a bit confused about why you need all this information from me. Could you please explain more about what it's for? 

Also, could you tell me more about your role at the UN Department? It sounds like such an interesting job!

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best regards.

Best wishes,
Jeffry
